text: Then invite to that, and be established ( on the Quran ) as you are commanded, and do not follow their desires, and say, “I believe in that which God has sent down of the book, and I am commanded to do justice between you, God is our Lord and your Lord, for us our deeds and for you your deeds, ( let there be ) no argument between us and you, God will bring us together and towards Him is the destination.”
